## BitField class

1D bit field, backed by a Uint32Array. Size is always a multiple of 32.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BitField 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(n)](./bitfield.bitfield._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BitField</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [data](./bitfield.bitfield.data.md) |  | <code>Uint32Array</code> |  |
|  [n](./bitfield.bitfield.n.md) |  | <code>number</code> |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [at(n)](./bitfield.bitfield.at.md) |  | Returns a non-zero value if bit <code>n</code> is enabled. No bounds checking. |
|  [resize(n)](./bitfield.bitfield.resize.md) |  | Resizes bitfield to new size given (rounded up to multiples of 32). |
|  [setAt(n, v)](./bitfield.bitfield.setat.md) |  | Enables or disables bit <code>n</code>. Returns a non-zero value if the bit was previously enabled. No bounds checking. . |
|  [toString()](./bitfield.bitfield.tostring.md) |  |  |
